brandStory.title: Shoreline Relics from Australia
brandStory.content: Every piece from Tasmanian Treasures begins its journey in the tempestuous Southern Ocean, at the bottom of the world. We walk remote shores in all weather, searching for the smoothest, most character-filled pieces of glass and sea sculpted pottery remnants from the early 1900's. We don’t alter their shape or color. We reinvent the discarded fragments and give them a new purpose, preserving their wild history for you to cherish.
